description:
A 26-year-old government researcher known for her genius-level intelligence. She studies and gives top secret seminars about the Protoculture research being undertaken by the U.N. She has known http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Roy Focker] in the past, before the events that will take place in the South Pacific Ocean one year before Space War I.
Source: Wiki
name: Aries Turner
